item.title: Albert Einstein - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
item.description: Albert Einstein (/ ˈ aɪ n s t aɪ n /; German: [ˈalbɛɐ̯t ˈaɪnʃtaɪn] ; 14 March 1879 – 18 April 1955) was a German-born theoretical physicist.

item.title: Albert Einstein - Physicist, Scientist - Biography.com
item.description: Biography.com offers a glimpse into the life of Albert Einstein, the most influential physicist of the 20th century who developed the theory of relativity.

item.title: Albert Einstein - Facts & Summary - HISTORY.com
item.description: Find out more about the history of Albert Einstein, including videos, interesting articles, pictures, historical features and more. Get all the facts on HISTORY.com

item.title: Albert Einstein - Biographical
item.description: Albert Einstein - Biographical. Questions and Answers on Albert Einstein. Albert Einstein was born at Ulm, in Württemberg, Germany, on March 14, 1879.

item.title: Albert Einstein: Theories, Facts, IQ and Quotes - Space.com
item.description: Albert Einstein profoundly changed physics and ideas about space and time. Learn his theories, find facts and quotes from the man with an IQ of 160.

item.title: About - Einstein Health
item.description: Einstein Healthcare Network 5501 Old York Road Philadelphia, PA 19141 (215) 456-7890 (General Public) (215) 456-6730 (Media) Einstein Healthcare Network is a private, not-for-profit organization with several major facilities and many outpatient centers.

item.title: Albert Einstein - Simple English Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
item.description: Albert Einstein (14 March 1879 – 18 April 1955) was a German-born theoretical physicist who developed the general theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics (alongside quantum mechanics).

item.title: Einstein: His Life and Universe: Walter Isaacson, Edward Herrmann ...
item.description: Einstein: His Life and Universe and over one million other books are available for Amazon Kindle. Learn more

item.title: The Official Licensing Site of Albert Einstein
item.description: Welcome to the Official Licensing Site of Albert Einstein. Learn more about Albert Einstein and contact us today for any commercial licensing inquiries.

item.title: Albert Einstein - Wikiquote
item.description: Autoritätsdusel ist der größte Feind der Wahrheit. Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth. Letter to Jost Winteler (1901), quoted in The Private Lives of Albert Einstein by Roger Highfield and Paul Carter (1993), p. 79.
